Text: Thank you so much! please keep seeding guys
Need more peers and seeds. I'm at 0.0%.

I recently got a MicroPhoto from a cousin, with a blown hard drive, I've replaced the hard drive with a Compact Flash drive, but he no longer had his install disc, so I've been looking for days for this.
Sadly this was the last place I looked, as I thought that maybe Creative would have the installation software on their site, but of course everything but...
So thanks for this, and I will seed as much as I can, I will probably stick it on more than one computer to seed once I've got it downloaded.
I'm downloading now at a measly 6kb/s. I'll be sure to seed this one. I've been looking for it for a while now, and I know there are lots of others in the same position.
